column5: Can't see your link from work, but they do have a diver go in the big tank in the Springfield store.  You actually go downstairs to a classroom and watch the diver describe the fish as he is feeding them.  Usually have a conservation officer there too with a few snakes and other wildlife.  Very cool.

bpsbassman...the link was kids who videotaped two of there friends who jumped in a fishtank in one of the stores in the states , the video was put on youtube.  I read that there was enough evidence on the tape to identify them and charge them.
I'll have to check it when I get home. What kind of lure did they use to get them out??
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA Oh man, that is the funniest thing I have seen in a while!!!  :lol:

Maybe I'm just getting old but I don't find that funny. Totally Disrespectful. I'm sure they have video of them spray painting graf on buildings too. I don't think a kid who goes fishing would do that, so why were they in BPS. F*cktards. Just my two cents.
I also don't find this very funny..  I hope those kids get a good punishment rather than just a slap on the wrist.
lol, sad thing is they probably planned that for weeks in advance. If only they'd put that much effort into a fishing trip.
hahahah, I know eh   I wonder if they got charged for Stupidity?!?!?
Ya, i don't find that funny even though i'm a kid.  It was pretty pointless too since they stayed in the water for 2 seconds and ran away like cowards.
Well seeing as they would have been charged.... running away was probably a good idea. Pretty funny if you ask me, although they do deserve a fine
Hey Terry,what ya doin this saturday????????????????????????? Part of me found it funny, but the other side, found it  stupid and disrespectful. Guess Im getting old too.LOL
Just watched it again... I still think it's stupid and disrespectful, but it is pretty funny when the second guy yells "cannon ball" before jumping in.
